file.title: AMM PART II-1285 - CHAPTER 05-40-13-06 - EWIS COMPONENTS IN THE FOWARD FUSELAGE II (LATERAL SIDE) - INSPECTION/CHECK

page.data: AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL EWIS COMPONENTS IN THE FOWARD FUSELAGE II (LATERAL SIDE) - INSPECTION/CHECK EFFECTIVITY: ALL 1. General A. This section gives the procedures to do the detailed inspection of the EWIS components in the forward fuselage II, cockpit lateral side. B. Related Zones: 223/224. C. Zone Boundaries ( AMM MPP 06-41-00/100 AMM MPP 06-41-00/100) . D. The procedures in this section are given in the sequence below. The tasks identified with ( ♦) are part of the Scheduled Maintenance Requirements Document (SMRD). TASK NUMBER DESCRIPTION EFFECTIVITY EWIS COMPONENTS IN THE FORWARD ALL 05-40-13-200-801-A ♦ FUSELAGE II (COCKPIT LATERAL SIDE) - DETAILED INSPECTION EMB-145 - AMM 1285 General 05-40-13 Page 1 of 5 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 05-40-13-200-801-A EFFECTIVITY: ALL 2. EWIS COMPONENTS IN THE FORWARD FUSELAGE II (COCKPIT LATERAL SIDE) - DETAILED INSPECTION A. General (1) This procedure obeys the EWIS ICA requirement. (2) This task gives the instructions to do SMRD Task Number: 20-00-00-220-011-A00. (3) You must do the detailed inspection of forward fuselage II, in zones 223/224, in the EWIS components of power cables. (4) Do not unlace or displace the electrical wiring and components, during the detailed visual inspections. (5) Do not disconnect the electrical connectors during the detailed visual inspections. (6) Refer to the preparation subtask for access panel information. B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION AMM MPP 06-41-03/100 - COMPONENT LOCATION WM 20-22-00 - C. Zones and Accesses ZONE PANEL/DOOR LOCATION 223 223MZ Cockpit LH/RH side 223 223UZ Cockpit LH/RH side 224 224MZ Cockpit LH/RH side 224 224NZ Cockpit LH/RH side D. Tools and Equipment ITEM DESCRIPTION PURPOSE QTY Standard Flashlight To make the inspection of the area easier Standard Ladder To get access to the area E. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable F. Consumable Materials Not Applicable G. Expandable Parts Not Applicable EMB-145 - AMM 1285 200-801-A/600 05-40-13 Page 2 of 5 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL H. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task Forward fuselage II - cockpit LH/RH sides I. Preparation SUBTASK 841-002-A (1) Open access panels 223MZ, 223UZ, 224MZ and 224NZ ( AMM MPP 06-41-03/100) J. EWIS Components in the Forward Fuselage II (Cockpit Lateral Side) - Detailed Inspection (Figure 601) (Figure 602) SUBTASK 220-002-A (1) Do a detailed inspection on the power cables, wiring bundles, and connected EWIS in Forward Fuselage II, cockpit lateral sides, for signs of damage, adequate installation, chafing and general condition. Refer to WM 20-22-00. K. Follow-on SUBTASK 842-002-A (1) Close the access panels 223MZ, 223UZ, 224MZ and 224NZ ( AMM MPP 06-41-03/100) EMB-145 - AMM 1285 200-801-A/600 05-40-13 Page 3 of 5 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.
